column2: "Sorry, I'm really really busy right now! Oh, it's you! You came at just the right time! I'm in big trouble here."

"I've been trying to make a moving statue for the center of the venue, but it just doesn't look right at all...
Its movement is really unsteady."
"I want to give it a more stable footing so it can balance itself perfectly..."
"So I need your help! Do you know anything that could be useful?"
